analysis.description:
P2PToken.refundTokens (/unique_contracts/0x2b4395084e1068877502ead1ae004094f5a0b88f.sol#372-381) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_contracts/0x2b4395084e1068877502ead1ae004094f5a0b88f.sol)
